title: Data Analysis for Journalism and Political Communication
text:
1 Introduction
This book is intended for journalists, political professionals, and students who hope to become journalists or political professionals to learn the principles and practices of data analysis. It is based on course materials developed at George Washington University’s School of Media and Public Affairs.

title: 2  Operationalization
text: Defined as “military conflict characterized by small, lightly armed bands practicing guerrilla warfare from rural base areas.”↩︎
